title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: sonata CRAN, install directly rOpenSci using code . Disclaimer: findings, interpretation, conclusions expressed herein authors necessarily reflect views United States Agency International Development. errors remain .
code: ## SETUP      # install via rOpenSci       install.packages("sonata", repos = c('https://usaid-mozambique.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))          # ATTACH PACKAGE       library(sonata)            ## LIST PACKAGE FUNCTIONS       ls("package::sonata")

title: Query anonymous statistics for Active on ART — calc_tx_active
code: calc_tx_active(   con,   enddate,   defaulter_tolerance = 28,   filter_by_location = FALSE,   location_uuid = "4be5f1a9-832c-4717-be41-ef4b6311c0ef" )

title: Query anonymous statistics for Active on ART — calc_tx_active
text: con MozART 2.0 database connection enddate Period close date (input 'YYYY-MM-DD') defaulter_tolerance Number tolerance days defaulters considered inactive filter_by_location Logical. TRUE, filters query specific location.  FALSE queries locations. location_uuid Health facility location_uuid filter filter_by_location TRUE
